msbt.message: I dunno anythin' about decoratin'. Never understood how anyone creates a "look" for their place. <20_2 arg="10" />I mean, how'd you know to pick out <20_2 arg="9" />your ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I reckon style's always just gonna stay a mystery to me,
<20_2 arg="10" />Did you pick mushrooms to make <20_2 arg="9" />your ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Good thing you have so MUSH room here in your place, Gahaha!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your sure is cool.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Cool, get it? 'Cause of the ice?
So you go for this zen style, huh? Didn't figure you for the quiet, meditatin' sort, but good for you.
Reckon everyone's thought about making building-block furniture at least once in their lives So <20_2 arg="10" />your is <20_2 arg="6" />like a kiddo's dream!
If your furniture's antique, then that probably means whoever used to own it is long gone Ever wonder who owned <20_2 arg="10" />your ?<20_2 arg="6" />Maybe it was someone famous!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Y'know, I reckon 'cause of your I feel like I'm back in school again! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I didn't like bein' in school much.

<20_2 arg="10" />Feels like we're vacationin', 'cause of <20_2 arg="9" />your !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Hey, if we gave this island more of a resort feel, maybe we could make it into a real vacation destination!

<20_2 arg="10" />Is this one of them home offices that I keep hearin' about, ?Feels like it might be, thanks to <20_2 arg="9" />your .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Hang on Are we on the clock right now? Should I start shufflin' papers?
Your decor feels so rugged! <20_2 arg="10" />Were real logs used to make <20_2 arg="9" />your ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You got true pioneer spirit, kiddo!
<20_2 arg="10" />So you go for cutesy stuff <20_2 arg="9" />like your , huh?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Not my sorta thing, but this ain't my place, . Whatever makes you happy, kiddo.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Is it made outta real fruit?No matter how hungry you get, don't eat your furniture, OK? Reckon that could give you a real bellyache.
<20_2 arg="10" />I gotta say, I'm really diggin' <20_2 arg="9" />your !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Nice to see someone else likes the classics. Good taste, !I'm kinda retro myself. Gahaha!
<20_2 arg="10" />Makes me miss bein' a kid, seein' <20_2 arg="9" />your <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Not a worry in the world, the whole day free to just play, If only, right?
<20_2 arg="10" />Did you use local shells to make<20_2 arg="9" /> your fancy ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Can't imagine how much beachcombin' that'd take.
<20_2 arg="10" />Look at all that wood and iron in <20_2 arg="9" />your !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />That's one classy combination.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Now how'd you end up with that swell, ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />And how do you keep from frettin' about cracks?
